languages.text: {n}Ноздри мужчины яростно раздуваются. Кое-как справившись с эмоциями, он произносит:{/n} "Даже если ты настаиваешь на моем возвращении, это не меняет главного — я больше не годен для службы Лексу. Так что для меня приговор один — остаться здесь и отправить в бездну столько ксеносов, сколько смогу".

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."
languages.original_text: {n}Ноздри мужчины яростно раздуваются. Кое-как справившись с эмоциями, он произносит:{/n} "Даже если ты настаиваешь на моем возвращении, это не меняет главного — я больше не годен для службы Лексу. Так что для меня приговор один — остаться здесь и отправить в бездну столько ксеносов, сколько смогу".

There is only one verdict for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは怒りでの鼻の穴が膨らんだ。かろうじて感情を制御しながら、彼はつぶやく。{/n}「たとえあなたが私の復帰を主張しても、私がもはやレックスに仕える資格がないという重要な事実は変わりません。私に下された判決は一つ、ここに留まり、1体でも多くの異種族を深淵に葬り去ることだけです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは怒りでの鼻の穴が膨らんだ。かろうじて感情を制御しながら、彼はつぶやく。{/n}「たとえあなたが私の復帰を主張しても、私がもはやレックスに仕える資格がないという重要な事実は変わりません。私に下された判決は一つ、ここに留まり、1体でも多くの異種族を深淵に葬り去ることだけです」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Nasenflügel beben vor Wut. Er kann seine Gefühle kaum unter Kontrolle halten und murmelt:{/n} "Selbst wenn Ihr auf meiner Rückkehr besteht, ändert das nichts an der zentralen Tatsche, dass ich nicht länger geeignet bin, dem Lex zu dienen. Es gibt für mich nur eine Strafe – hier zu bleiben und möglichst viele Xenos in den Abgrund zu reißen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Nasenflügel beben vor Wut. Er kann seine Gefühle kaum unter Kontrolle halten und murmelt:{/n} "Selbst wenn Ihr auf meiner Rückkehr besteht, ändert das nichts an der zentralen Tatsche, dass ich nicht länger geeignet bin, dem Lex zu dienen. Es gibt für mich nur eine Strafe – hier zu bleiben und möglichst viele Xenos in den Abgrund zu reißen."

languages.text: {n}La furia hincha las fosas nasales de Solomorne. Murmura, apenas capaz de controlar sus emociones:{/n} «Aunque insista en que regrese, eso no cambia el hecho crucial de que ya no soy apto para servir a la Lex. Solo hay una sentencia posible para mí: debo quedarme y enviar a tantos xenos como pueda al abismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}La furia hincha las fosas nasales de Solomorne. Murmura, apenas capaz de controlar sus emociones:{/n} «Aunque insista en que regrese, eso no cambia el hecho crucial de que ya no soy apto para servir a la Lex. Solo hay una sentencia posible para mí: debo quedarme y enviar a tantos xenos como pueda al abismo».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙愤怒地撑大了鼻孔，低声开了口，几乎无法克制住自己的感情。{/n}“即便你坚持要我回来，我也不再适合为帝国律法服务，没人能改变这个关键事实。我应得的判决只有一种，那就是留在这里，尽我所能，把那些异形拖入深渊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙愤怒地撑大了鼻孔，低声开了口，几乎无法克制住自己的感情。{/n}“即便你坚持要我回来，我也不再适合为帝国律法服务，没人能改变这个关键事实。我应得的判决只有一种，那就是留在这里，尽我所能，把那些异形拖入深渊。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, öfkeyle burnundan soluyor. Duygularını güçlükle dizginleyerek homurdanıyor.{/n} "Dönmemde ısrar etseniz bile bu, artık Lex'e hizmet etmeye uygun olmadığım gerçeğini değiştirmeyecektir. Benim için verilebilecek tek bir hüküm var. O da burada kalmak ve elimden geldiğince çok zenoyu dipsizliğe göndermek."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}"Solomorne öfkeyle burnundan solur. Duygularını güçlükle dizginleyerek homurdanır:{/n} "Dönmemde ısrar etseniz bile bu, artık Lex'e hizmet etmeye uygun olmadığım gerçeğini değiştirmeyecektir. Benim için verilebilecek tek bir hüküm var. O da burada kalmak ve elimden geldiğince çok zenoyu dipsizliğe göndermek."

languages.text: {n}Les narines de Solomorne se dilatent sous l'effet de la colère. Peinant à reprendre le contrôle de ses émotions, il marmonne :{/n} « Quand bien même vous exigeriez mon retour, cela ne changera rien au fait que je ne suis plus apte à servir la Lex. Je ne mérite qu'un seul châtiment... demeurer ici et envoyer le plus de xénos possible dans les abysses. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. There is only one sentence for me — to stay here and send as many xenos to the abyss as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les narines de Solomorne se dilatent sous l'effet de la colère. Peinant à reprendre le contrôle de ses émotions, il marmonne :{/n} « Quand bien même vous exigeriez mon retour, cela ne changera rien au fait que je ne suis plus apte à servir la Lex. Je ne mérite qu'un seul châtiment... demeurer ici et envoyer le plus de xénos possible dans les abysses. »
